pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Greenbone Security Assistant is the web interface developed for the Greenbone Security Manager appliances. It connects to the Greenbone Vulnerability Manager GVM to provide a full-featured user interface for vulnerability management. Greenbone Security Assistant consists of GSA - The webpage written in React and GSAD - The HTTP server talking to the GVM daemon.
